DOC.detailed_description: This double blind , placebo control study C-1073 evaluate effect cognition patient mild moderate Alzheimer 's disease already receive acetylcholinesterase inhibitor stable dose least 12 week . Patients randomize ( 1:1 ) either daily dose 300 mg C-1073 placebo 16 week . Patients continue stable daily dose acetylcholinesterase inhibitor throughout study . Visits weekly beginning study , every two week , every 4 week week 12 . Assessments visit may include cognition behavior , depression , safety , well physical exam , clinical laboratory test , EKG adverse event reporting .
